entry.title: my training record
entry.content:
Organize and Expand My Fitness Content

First Training Session

This is your reminder for todayâ€™s session:

  • Session Type: Regular Class
  • Time: 6:15 PM
  • Duration: 60 minutes
  • Focus: Pelvic Structure Improvement + Cardio
  • Reminder: Bring your workout gear, eat a light meal 1 hour before training to maintain muscle endurance. [Post-Workout Feedback]
  • Todayâ€™s Focus: Back + Cardio

Highlights of This Session:
âœ” Lat Pulldown â€“ Excellent engagement of the teres major and latissimus dorsi, full range of motion with proper lat stretch. ğŸ‘
âœ” V-Bar Pulldown â€“ Stable and controlled movement, great lat activation. ğŸ‘
âœ” Cardio Training â€“ Completed with good intensity and proper energy expenditure without overexertion.

Post-Session Notes:

  • Maintain consistent training to improve endurance and build a foundation for future cardio sessions.
  • Adjust your dietâ€”avoid high-calorie meals at night.

Second Training Session

[Wednesday Post-Workout Feedback]
Todayâ€™s Focus: Shoulders + Fat-Burning

Highlights of This Session:
âœ” Smith Machine Shoulder Press â€“ Empty bar, 4 sets âœ…
âœ” 2kg Lateral Raises + Resistance Band â€“ 20 reps, 4 sets âœ…
âœ” 2.5kg Face Pulls â€“ 4 sets âœ…
âœ” Crunches â€“ 25 reps, 2 sets âœ…
âœ” Medicine Ball Press â€“ 30 sec, 3 sets âœ…

Areas for Improvement:

  • Muscle strength and endurance need work.
  • Cardio capacity requires further development.
  • Consistency will lead to progress.

Post-Session Notes:

  • Keep meals lightâ€”low oil, salt, and carbs.
  • Increase protein intake for balanced nutrition.
  • Get enough rest!

Third Training Session

[Post-Workout Feedback]
Todayâ€™s Focus: Glute Training

Highlights of This Session:
âœ” Seated Hip Abduction (Adjusted Form) â€“ Successfully targeted the upper glutes, better mind-muscle connection. ğŸ‘
âœ” Hip Thrusts â€“ Quick learning progress, strong activation of the mid-lower glutes.
âœ” Cardio Training â€“ Excellent performance, noticeable improvement in endurance and fitness level!

Post-Session Notes:

  • A slight feeling of hunger before bed can aid fat loss.
  • Stay consistentâ€”progress is guaranteed with persistence!

entry.title: farm
entry.content: We went to the countryside to plant peanuts today. The breeze was cool and refreshing, but I just stood by and watched as they worked the fields. My dad was using a needle to inject liquid into a tree, causing it to die. We bought two kilograms of peanuts, and after planting, only a few taels remained. They were planted on a slope, and my grandmother hoed the ground, her face dripping with sweat.here is the farm we worked on.
